narrative.narrative: R1 Airlines, formerly Regional 1,are a charter airline based at Calgary,Alberta. It started in August 2003 and did scheduled service until September 2005. It served Red Deer,Alberta and in British Columbia it served Vancouver,Kelowna,Kamloops and Victoria. Its main charter customers are the oil and gas industry,mining,humanitarian missions in places like the Congo,the construction industry,energy and utilities and forestry. At October 2014 its fleet was three Dash 8-200's,three Dash 8-100's, a Dash 8-300,four CRJ200's and a Beehchcraft 1900D. It had a BAe 146-200 at one time and a CRJ100 fo a while also. On November 15,2013 it entered a joint venture with Air Georgian, and are now owned by the same company. This gives R1 access to that airlines planes and maintenance centers all over Canada too.

prefereds.aircrafts: Bombardier Dash 8-200,Bombardier Dash 8-300,Bombardier Dash 8-100,Bombardier CRJ200,Bombardier CRJ100,Beechcraft 1900D
